question.questionText: Explain in one sentence what each graph tells you. Graph B) speed of light versus time.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: As time increases, the speed of light stays the same (remains constant).

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: This graph tells me that the speed never changes.
How long it takes to get to the speed of light.
The speed of light is fast.
How fast the speed of light is.
It shows how fast the speed of light is.
This graph shows me the speed of the light and how long the speed was.
That there is average time and a lot of speed of light.
It tells me that the speed of light goes straight.
I think this graph tells me that the time is about 40 seconds and speed of light is about 25.
It tells you half of the speed of light.
This graph tells you how fast the speed of light is.
This graph tells you how fast the speed of light travels in a certain amount of time.
It does not matter how much you give it the speed of light goes just as fast.
It tells you the time and the speed of light.
As time goes on the speed of light stays the same.
